# 순위 + 이미지

```{r}
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)

bb_tbl <- read_csv("data/bb.csv")

image_files <- fs::dir_ls("images/artists/")

image_files |> 
  enframe() |> 
  select(name) |> 
  mutate(artist = sub(".*/(.*)\\..*$", "\\1", name))

bb_tbl |> 
  group_by(가수그룹)
  


```
